item.title: Question Sets From Summer 2023
item.description: Qual Prep Course Resource # One of our graduate students Shashank P Singh has supplied the materials he used when he taught the qual prep course in summer 2023.

item.title: Thoughts on qualifying exams
item.description: So, you’re gearing up for your Qualification Exams, but before you begin, I’d like to share a few thoughts about the exams and the preparation. This has less to do with the course material and more to do with the ’exam’ aspect of it.
